articles.author: Elaine Woo
articles.title: Frank Gehry, who stretched architecture’s boundaries, dies at 96 - The Washington Post
articles.description: His unearthly but brilliant designs, from Los Angeles to Bilbao, became global landmarks.
articles.content: Frank Gehry, whose provocatively adventurous buildings among them the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao, Spain, and the Walt Disney Concert Hall in Los Angeles liberated modernist architecture from its con… [+140 chars]

articles.title: Netflix to buy Warner Bros film and streaming businesses for $72bn - BBC
articles.description: The major Hollywood deal means Netflix will takeover ownership of franchises including Harry Potter and Game of Thrones.
articles.content:
Rachel ClunBusiness reporter
Netflix has agreed to buy the film and streaming businesses of Warner Bros Discovery for $72bn (£54bn) in a major Hollywood deal.
